constants.name: transport_solver_numerics_bc_type
constants.header: List of boundary condition types for 1D transport solvers

int.name: value
int.description: Boundary condition is the value of the equations primary quantity

int.name: derivative_or_ip
int.description: Boundary condition is the radial derivative of the equations primary quantity, or the plasma current for the current diffusion equation

int.name: e_folding_length_or_vloop
int.description: Boundary condition is the e-folding length of the equations primary quantity, or the loop voltage for the current diffusion equation

int.name: flux
int.description: Boundary condition is the flux of the equations primary quantity

int.name: combination
int.description: Boundary condition is a linear combination of radial derivative and value of the flux of the equations primary quantity, in the form a1.y-prime + a2.y = a3
